name: Expert Herbalism
summary: Your advanced alchemy level for herbalism increases to your level – 3.
description:
Your advanced alchemy level for herbalism increases to your level – 3. You gain the formulas for elixirs of life as soon as your advanced alchemy level is high enough to create them: lesser at 8th level, moderate at 12th level, greater at 16th level, and major at 18th level.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
